internetWarningPage.title: Internet connection not recommended
internetWarningPage.desc: Do you know that you can {{type}} wallet without an Internet connection? You are encouraged to do this in an offline environment, as it could reduce the risk of your mnemonic phrase and your funds being stolen. After this step, you can go online again to enjoy the Glitch wallet.

createWalletPage.title: Create new wallet
createWalletPage.protect_your_wallet: Protect your wallet with a password
createWalletPage.please_write_down_these_12_words: Please write down these 12 words in the correct order on paper and store it somewhere safe
createWalletPage.enter_the_following_words: Enter the following words from your mnemonic phrase in the correct order.
createWalletPage.please_remember_this_password: Please remember this password. If you lose your password, everything in this account is lost.
createWalletPage.i_understand_that_glitch: I understand that Glitch Wallet cannot recover this password for me
